BlackJack Wear

Introducing the first card game app for Android smart watches, Blackjack Wear. Play Vegas style black jack from the watch with swipe gestures.

TicTacToe Wear

Play Tic Tac Toe on your Android phone and smart watch. Play 1 player mode with AI or play 2 player mode with someone else.

Satisfy your Gamer Sweet tooth with Dolce Games.

Our mission is simple - to create fun and useful apps for today's fast paced and always changing technology devices. We're continuously adding new applications, so stop by often.

Online Multiplayer Features

Our multiplayer option lets you play with your friends, wherever they may be. Make new friends with other players from around the world.

Free for Life

Enjoy our games for free in the Google Play store. No hidden premium fees or lite versions. Our games are free for life.

Smart App for your Smart Watch

We have apps that is compatible for both your Android phone and Android smart watch. Play the latest games with the latest technology.

Options Galore

Our goal is to provide games that provide hours of fun, so we are always open to hear from our customers on features they'd like to see in our games. Let us know, we're all ears.
